mapper.update: UPDATE t_int_code_reqstion SET fcreator = #{codeSubmitList.creator, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fsubmit_target = #{codeSubmitList.submitTarget, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbug_no = #{codeSubmitList.bugNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frequire_desc = #{codeSubmitList.requireDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fcode_modify_desc = #{codeSubmitList.codeModifyDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fscope =#{codeSubmitList.scope, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fis_self_test = #{codeSubmitList.isSelfTest, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, fsmoke_test = #{codeSubmitList.smokeTest, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, fjava_files = #{codeSubmitList.javaFiles, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmeta_files = #{codeSubmitList.metaFiles, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fdb_script = #{codeSubmitList.dbScript, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fstatus = #{codeSubmitList.status, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, fremark = #{codeSubmitList.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where fid = #{codeSubmitList.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE t_int_code_reqstion SET fstatus = 1 WHERE fid = #{id}
UPDATE t_int_code_reqstion SET fstatus = 2 WHERE fid = #{id}
UPDATE t_int_code_reqstion SET fstatus = 0, fcreate_time = now() WHERE fid = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_int_code_reqstion (fcreate_time, fupdate_time, fcreator_id, fproject_id, fsubmit_target, frequire_desc, fcode_modify_desc, fscope, fsonar, fsmoke_test, fcode_review, funit_test, fjava_files, fmeta_files, fdb_script, fstatus, fremark) VALUES ( date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{codeSubmitList.creator, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codeSubmitList.project, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codeSubmitList.submitTarget, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codeSubmitList.requireDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeSubmitList.codeModifyDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeSubmitList.scope, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeSubmitList.sonar, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codeSubmitList.smokeTest, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codeSubmitList.unitTest, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codeSubmitList.codeReview, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codeSubmitList.javaFiles, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeSubmitList.metaFiles, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeSubmitList.dbScript, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeSubmitList.status, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{codeSubmitList.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
